description:
48 Saltaire Drive Strathtulloh

(PLEASE USE IPHONE APPLE MAPS OR WWW.WHEREIS.COM TO FIND THE ADDRESS)

Only 5% deposit to secure the property and balance on settlement in May 2023.

Ticks All The Buyer's Wish List

- Land size - 350 sqm approx
- Built Up - 23 approx
- Approx 1 km to Strathtulloh Primary School
- Approx 2 kms to upcoming Melton Hospital
- Approx 2 kms to Cobblebank Train station

Mike Sarupria & Ray White Tarneit presents Porter Davis under construction beauty in the prestigious Atherstone Estate in heart of Melton South, just 45 minutes west of the city.

With 4 bedrooms and a spacious formal lounge, the formal lounge is well positioned at the front of the home to welcome people into the home or as a secluded place to enjoy downtime away from the home's main-living hub.

The family room is a dominant feature in the house - intimate, yet spacious and open and doused in natural light.

The kitchen also features a handy servery to the outdoor area, ensuring the living area is geared to year-round entertaining. It also has a walk-in pantry for convenient extra storage space.

48 Saltaire Drive features 4 bedrooms with master bedroom boasting a good size walk-in-robe and double vanity ensuite. Remaining 3 bedrooms comes with built in robes serviced by a central bathroom.

Inspired features are everywhere:

- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
- Fully landscaped front & backyard
- 900 mm stainless steel gas cook top and range- hood
- 20 mm stone benchtop in kitchen and bathrooms
- Remote control double lock garage
- Security alarm system and much more!!

Ray White Tarneit welcomes you and looks forward to meet you at the open homes.

Call Mike on 0430 126 491 today to set an appointment for private inspection!!

(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)

DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Pictures are from previous similar property. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
